name: breaded chicken cutlets
description: crispy, double breaded and fried chicken

name: rice with onion
ingredients:
- rice
- neutral oil
- half an onion
steps:
1. Cook the rice
2. Slice the onion
3. Fry the onion in the oil in a pan
4. Place the rice into the pan with the oil and mix
